LanguageData.VQE_MakeStunAndParalizeAffectAnomalies: Allow stun and paralize damage to affect entities
LanguageData.VQE_MakeStunAndParalizeAffectAnomaliesDe: If disabled, stun and paralize damage from this mod will NOT affect entities from the Anomaly DLC
LanguageData.VQE_MakeStunAndParalizeAffectInsectoidBo: Allow stun and paralize damage to affect insectoid bosses
If disabled, stun and paralize damage from this mod will NOT affect insectoid bosses from Vanilla Factions Expanded - Insectoids 2
LanguageData.VQE_MakeStunAndParalizeAffectXMLDefined: Allow stun and paralize damage to affect specific creatures
LanguageData.VQE_MakeStunAndParalizeAffectXMLDefinedD: If disabled, stun and paralize damage from this mod will NOT affect specific creatures that are defined via XML. These can be defined by other modders. Dy default this affects the Gallatross, Behemoth, Summit Crab, Fungal Husk and Archotech Centipede.
